name: Towelket: One More Time 4
description:
Towelket: One More Time 4 - Ocean is a freeware story-heavy adventure/RPG made in RPG MAKER 2000. In February 2021 an English fan translation has been completed.

A boy was led by a fairy to a mysterious ocean world. The main character Mocha and a girl set out to search for him. Meanwhile, the fish-hats plotted to take over the world. Can Mocha and his friends find the boy and stop the bad guys?
